head.supplied: Museum, Hobart Town ¶ 5th April 1875 ¶ Dear Baron von Mueller, ¶ ¶ I herewith send you, for correction, the proofs of your Census of Tasmanian Plants, ¶ also the Ms. and some letters relative to the...

div.p: RSA/B.2 letter press book, p.67, Royal Society of Tasmania Archives, Hobart.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
I herewith send you, for correction, the proofs of your Census of Tasmanian Plants,
B75.13.10. also the Ms. and some letters relative to the same. Will you kindly return the proofs by the earliest opportunity as the printer is waiting to complete the work.

I have sent the letters as they have reference to some additions to the paper,
Presumably M to J. Agnew, 20 February 1875, and M to J. Agnew, 25 February 1875. which, as you will perceive have not yet been made, and which I thought had better be attended to by yourself. Please return the Ms. and letters with the proofs here.
